sellers.name: Green Valley Farm
sellers.description: Organic produce grown with sustainable farming practices
sellers.longDescription: Green Valley Farm has been growing organic produce for over 20 years. We believe in sustainable farming practices and providing the community with the freshest, most nutritious food possible. Our farm spans 50 acres of certified organic land where we grow a wide variety of vegetables, fruits, and herbs.

sellers.name: Rustic Bakery
sellers.description: Traditional bread-making with locally sourced ingredients
sellers.longDescription: Rustic Bakery specializes in traditional bread-making techniques. We use only the finest ingredients and time-honored methods to create breads that are both delicious and nutritious. Our sourdough starter is over 100 years old and we source our flour from local mills.

sellers.name: Happy Hen Farm
sellers.description: Free-range eggs from humanely raised chickens
sellers.longDescription: Happy Hen Farm raises chickens in a humane, sustainable way. Our birds have plenty of space to roam and access to fresh air and sunshine year-round. We feed them a natural diet of organic grains and allow them to forage for insects and greens.

sellers.name: Herb Garden Co
sellers.description: Fresh culinary herbs grown without pesticides
sellers.longDescription: Herb Garden Co grows a wide variety of culinary herbs using organic methods. We focus on flavor and freshness, ensuring you get the best herbs for your kitchen. Our greenhouse allows us to provide fresh herbs year-round.

sellers.name: Prairie Ranch
sellers.longDescription: Prairie Ranch raises cattle using traditional ranching methods. Our animals graze on natural grasslands and are never given growth hormones or unnecessary antibiotics. We believe in raising animals the way nature intended.

products.name: Fresh Organic Tomatoes
products.description: Sweet, juicy tomatoes grown without pesticides

products.name: Artisan Sourdough Bread
products.description: Traditional sourdough made with local flour

products.name: Fresh Eggs
products.description: Farm fresh eggs from free-range chickens

products.name: Fresh Strawberries
products.description: Sweet, ripe strawberries picked this morning
